# 源码

<div class="tabs">
        <div class="tabsHead">
            <div class="tabsItem">体育</div>
            <div class="tabsItem">美女</div>
            <div class="tabsItem">娱乐</div>
        </div>
        <div class="tabsBody">
            <div class="tabsPane">这是体育新闻</div>
            <div class="tabsPane">这是美女新闻</div>
            <div class="tabsPane">这是娱乐新闻</div>
        </div>
    </div>

let tab=new Tabs(".tabs")
